plugin - package plugin
Package of the plugin structure
Plugin - Interface in plugins
represents a pluginTest that can be dynamiccaly added to the extendable editor.
pluginAdded(File) - Method in class gui.HelpMenu
The method that converts the file into a plugin and then add it as an item in the Help menu.
pluginAdded(File) - Method in class gui.ToolsMenu
The method that converts the file into a plugin and then add it as an item in the Tools menu.
pluginAdded(File) - Method in class plugin.PluginAddedLogger
The method that prints in the console the name of the plugin after it has been added.
pluginAdded(File) - Method in interface plugin.PluginListener
The action that will be done when a plugin is added.
PluginAddedLogger - Class in plugin
The class PluginAddedLogger will only be a class that prints in the console
PluginAddedLogger() - Constructor for class plugin.PluginAddedLogger
 
PluginAddedLoggerMain - Class in main
 
PluginAddedLoggerMain() - Constructor for class main.PluginAddedLoggerMain
 
pluginAlreadyAdded(Set<File>) - Method in class plugin.PluginFinder
The method that adds new plugins to the Set alreadyFoundFiles that is used to compare each time we check files.
PluginFilter - Class in plugin
The class PluginFilter will be the class that checks if a file is well made and can be added to the application as a plugin.
PluginFilter() - Constructor for class plugin.PluginFilter
 
PluginFinder - Class in plugin
The class PluginFinder will be the class that takes all files that are conform to filters and launches methods that will create items in the tool and help menu.
PluginFinder(String, PluginFilter) - Constructor for class plugin.PluginFinder
The constructor of PluginFinder
PluginListener - Interface in plugin
The interface PluginListener that defines the methods that have to be used by all the plugin listeners
PluginLoader - Class in plugin
The class PluginLoader is used to load a class in a file and convert it into a plugin
PluginLoader() - Constructor for class plugin.PluginLoader
 
pluginRemoved(File) - Method in class gui.HelpMenu
The method that removes all the plugins in the Help Menu that aren't in the Map pluginAlreadyFoundTmp.
pluginRemoved(File) - Method in class gui.ToolsMenu
The method that removes all the plugins in the Help Menu that aren't in the Map pluginAlreadyFoundTmp.
pluginRemoved(File) - Method in class plugin.PluginAddedLogger
The method that prints in the console the name of the plugin after it has been removed.
pluginRemoved(File) - Method in interface plugin.PluginListener
The action that will be done when a plugin is removed.
plugins - package plugins
Package of the plugins of the application
